imdb.title: Working!!
imdb.plot: Due to his love for small, cute things, Souta Takanashi cannot turn childlike Popura Taneshima down when she recruits him to work for Wagnaria, a family restaurant located in Hokkaido. Takanashi takes particular joy in doting on t...

episodes.title: Popura no Iji
episodes.plot: Sota asks Inami to hold on once a day before punching a boy but the manager killing a bug creates a big argument between the staff.

episodes.title: Risô no Kazoku Keikaku
episodes.plot: Yamada envies Sota spoiling Taneshima and asks him and Souma to be her brothers. She tries to find out more about mysterious Souma.

episodes.title: Suranpu no Wake
episodes.plot: Nazuna comes back to Wagnaria and tells Izumi about Inami but she mistakes her for Taneshima. Izumi decides to go out to fix the situation. Nazuna makes a bond with the staff of Wagnaria.

episodes.title: Manhôru Supairaru
episodes.plot: Todoroki meets Otoo's lost wife but lets her slip away and that makes her regret her actions. Inami concerns about Satou's feelings for Todoroki.

episodes.title: Shûnin, Kainin, Mô Kannin
episodes.plot: When Taneshima and Satou catch cold the manager asks two of her former henchmen/women to work. Sota gets in to a fight with Inami because of the manager.

episodes.title: Wagunaria e youkoso Takanashi, hataraku.
episodes.plot: Wagnaria Restaurant needs a new part-timer and childlike Taneshima is in charge of finding a new employee. She runs to Takanashi who agrees to work there because he adores little things.

episodes.title: Inami, dansei kyoufushou. Datte kowaindamon...
episodes.plot: Takanashi finally meets Inami. She suffers from Androphobia (fear of adult men) which led her to hit any guy she see including Takanashi.

episodes.title: Yachiyo to Kyouko to Satou... to, kaettekita Otoo-san
episodes.plot: Takanashi tries to help Inami for the sake of Taneshima but she keeps hitting him. The story behind Todoroki's Katana and her relationship with the manager Shirafuji reveals.

episodes.title: Souma, sawayaka sugiru seinen
episodes.plot: Sota's drunken bigger sister shows up in the restaurant and he tries to hide his embarrassing childhood from everyone. He finds out that Souma is not as nice as he looks.

episodes.title: Aru kaze no hi ni..., itsumo to shigau Wagunaria
episodes.plot: Inami has not any progress with her condition and Sota needs to take the day off in a male crowded day. Also Todoroki tries to find out who is Satou's "secret love".

episodes.title: Souta no yuuutsu, Takanashike no onnatachi
episodes.plot: Sota gives Taneshima and Inami gifts for the White Day in response to their Valentine chocolates. He also faces drama at home. Inami has a hard time about her first gift from a guy.

episodes.title: Hisashiburi no Otoo to, atarashii baito = Yamada (!?)
episodes.plot: Otto the founder of the restaurant is back and there is a girl named Yamada with him who claims that she had lost her memory. Sato doesn't believe her and thinks she actually ran away from home. Yamada makes a lot of trouble for everyone.

episodes.title: Inami, hajimete? No odekake!
episodes.plot: The water pipe in front of restaurant is broken and they have to shut is down for a day. Girls decide to go to a hot spring and that makes Sato worried about Inami.

episodes.title: Dêto to iu na no 'Kessen', Takanashi to Inami no sorekara...
episodes.plot: Takanashi takes Inami to a Date. Is it possible for him to survive the day?
